mapper.insert: insert into qna values(qna_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{name}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, qna_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update qna set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
update qna set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step>#{step}
mapper.select:
select count(num) from qna where
name contents title
like '%'||#{search}||'%' and num > 0
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
